### Checklist
- [ ] Plugin passes validation (`python tools/validate.py plugin-name`)
- [ ] No conflicts with existing plugins (`--check-conflicts`)
- [ ] JSON files are valid
- [ ] README is updated
- [ ] No sensitive data or secrets included
- [ ] Tested locally with Claude Code

- [ ] Skills
